::Feline::

She purred as HotRod kissed her again.  She sighs, "I didn't think I 
could ever trust anyone again." She smiled, "but, for some strange 
reason, I trust you." She kissed him back and purred. "Thank you."



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> ::Hot Rod::
> 
> "Thats understandable. It must have been..." He stoped, not wanting 
to
> stir up bad memorys, any farther.
> "So what do we do now?" He really didn't know, the situation was 
acword.
> He droped his hands down, so they rested on her hips.
> He kissed her, putting all the feeling he could into it.
